FloatParameter.name: pwr_scaling_factor

FloatParameter.name: suspKinematicsPreEventIntegrationStep
FloatParameter.Comment: Integration time step for pre analysis[s]

FloatParameter.Comment: Front suspension maximum wheel travel kinematics for statics model suspension kinematics [m]

IntParameter.name: statistics
IntParameter.Comment: activation flag for 7-post statistics

FloatParameter.name: actuators_max_jounce
FloatParameter.Comment: Maximum actuator vertical jounce

FloatParameter.name: actuators_min_jounce
FloatParameter.Comment: Minimum actuator vertical jounce

IntParameter.name: psd_output
IntParameter.Comment: Activation flag for PSD data output

IntParameter.name: psd_segment_points
IntParameter.Comment: Number of points for time sequence used for PSD evaluation

FloatParameter.name: psd_overlap
FloatParameter.Comment: Time sequence overalpping percentage [%]

IntParameter.name: psd_fft_points
IntParameter.Comment: Number of points for used by Fast Fourier Tranform algorithm

FloatParameter.name: psd_sampling_freq
FloatParameter.Comment: Sampling frequency for PSD evaluation

FloatParameter.name: x_translational_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for chassis translational stiffness lock PID

FloatParameter.name: y_translational_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for chassis translational stiffness lock PID

FloatParameter.name: z_rotational_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for chassis z rotational stiffness lock PID

IntParameter.name: activity_flag
IntParameter.Comment: Activation flag for body stake

FloatParameter.name: hub_actuators_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for vertical hub actuators

FloatParameter.name: hub_actuators_kd
FloatParameter.Comment: Derivative Gain for vertical hub actuators

FloatParameter.name: hub_actuators_ki
FloatParameter.Comment: Integral Gain for vertical hub actuators

IntParameter.name: unlock_wheels
IntParameter.Comment: flag to unlock wheel rotation

FloatParameter.name: hub_actuators_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for vertical hub actuators

FloatParameter.name: hub_actuators_kd
FloatParameter.Comment: Derivative Gain for vertical hub actuators

FloatParameter.name: hub_actuators_ki
FloatParameter.Comment: Integral Gain for vertical hub actuators

IntParameter.name: use_pid_constant_part
IntParameter.Comment: if 1 previous pid value will be summed up to runtime pid value - useful for small unsprung masses-

FloatParameter.name: static_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: testrig step is not achieved until the norms of the system speeds & acceleration are below this value

IntParameter.name: active
IntParameter.Comment: if 1 setup will be applied to the model before performing suspension analysis.

FloatParameter.name: gravity_for_testrig_setup
FloatParameter.Comment: Acceleration due to gravity for testrig setup.

IntParameter.name: multicast_server_flag
IntParameter.Comment: if 1 data for live animation will be sent through a multicast server

IntParameter.name: udp_port
IntParameter.Comment: udp port for server connection ( if 0 automatically detected at simulation run)

IntParameter.name: tcp_port
IntParameter.Comment: tcp port used to communicate with animator

IntParameter.name: reuse_animator_flag
IntParameter.Comment: if 1 permits to reuse a previuos instance of VI-Animator

FloatParameter.name: max_solver_waiting_time
FloatParameter.Comment: maximum time that VI-CarRealtime solver will wait for a VI-Animator connection

IntParameter.name: tire_calc_active_flag
IntParameter.Comment: if 1 permits to launch tire calculation on a separated thread
if 1 permits to launch tire calculation on a separated thread

IntParameter.name: active_verbose_mode
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag to enable verbose mode

IntParameter.name: active_runtime_log
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag to enable runtime log writing

IntParameter.name: use_polynomial
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for compliance curve polynomial fitting

IntParameter.name: polynomial_order
IntParameter.Comment: compliance curve polinomial order

IntParameter.name: use_spline_extrapolation
IntParameter.Comment: enables spline extrapolation

IntParameter.name: use_polynomial
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for kinematic curve polynomial fitting

IntParameter.name: polynomial_order
IntParameter.Comment: kinematic curve polinomial order

IntParameter.name: use_spline_extrapolation
IntParameter.Comment: enables spline extrapolation

FloatParameter.name: cross_compliance_jounce_bias
FloatParameter.Comment: jounce used as second independent variable on cross compliance splines (0: side jounce - 1: opposite jounce)

IntParameter.name: compliance_velocity_computation_flag
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for compliance deformation velocity computation.

FloatParameter.name: compliance_velocity_filter_cutoff_freq
FloatParameter.Comment: cutoff frequency for compliance deformation velocity lowpass filter.

IntParameter.name: compliance_extra_output_activity
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for compliance deformations and velocities additional output.

IntParameter.name: compliance_map_linear_extrapolation_flag
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for compliance maps linear extrapolation (default = Flat).

FloatParameter.name: compliance_map_translational_cut_off_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: threshold value for translational compliance map activation (units = m / Newton).

FloatParameter.name: compliance_map_rotational_cut_off_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: threshold value for rotational compliance map activation (units = rad / Newton).

IntParameter.name: active_dump
IntParameter.Comment: if 1 solver will perform only the static analysis.

StringParameter.name: method
StringParameter.Comment: spline interpolation method ( options: DeBoor, Akima).

IntParameter.name: computation_mode
IntParameter.Comment: standard computation (value = 0), backward interpolation (value = 1), forward extrapolation (value = 2).

IntParameter.name: use_damper_force_extrapolation
IntParameter.Comment: standard computation (value = 0), force extrapolation (value = 1)

IntParameter.name: flying_car_computation_mode
IntParameter.Comment: standard computation (value = 0), estimated contact points(value = 1), maintain heights for aero/skidplate (value = 2).

IntParameter.name: automatic_initial_gear_selection
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for enabling initial gear auto-selection.

IntParameter.name: experimental_initial_condition
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for enabling experimental clutch/engine initial conditions.

IntParameter.name: enable_extra_parts
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for enabling extra parts connections.

IntParameter.name: enable_extra_output
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for enabling extra_outputs.

IntParameter.name: extra_output_activity
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for enabling extra output computation.

IntParameter.name: inertial_contribute_activity
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for enabling inertial contribute on kingpin computation.

IntParameter.name: steering_axis_compliance_correction_activity
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for enabling compliance correction on steering axis computation.

FloatParameter.name: ABS_control_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: ABS Control Threshold

FloatParameter.name: ABS_control_gain
FloatParameter.Comment: ABS Control gain

IntParameter.name: built_in_ABS_active
IntParameter.Comment: ABS Control Activity Flag

FloatParameter.name: low_speed_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: threshold below which the abs is turned off

FloatParameter.name: TCS_control_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: TCS Control Threshold

FloatParameter.name: TCS_control_gain
FloatParameter.Comment: TCS Control gain

IntParameter.name: built_in_TCS_active
IntParameter.Comment: TCS Control Activity Flag

FloatParameter.name: hitch_ball_loc_X
FloatParameter.Comment: X Location for car hitch ball

FloatParameter.name: hitch_ball_loc_Y
FloatParameter.Comment: Y Location for car hitch ball

FloatParameter.name: hitch_ball_loc_Z
FloatParameter.Comment: Z Location for car hitch ball

IntParameter.name: use_road_plane_direction
IntParameter.Comment: Road Direction Activity Flag

IntParameter.name: aero_force_statics_active
IntParameter.Comment: Aerodynamic Force Activity Flag for Static Analysis

IntParameter.name: torque_reaction_on_chassis_active
IntParameter.Comment: Driveline Torque Reaction Part Flag: 1=on chassis 0=on unsprung mass

IntParameter.name: built_in_clutch_active
IntParameter.Comment: Internal Clutch Activity Flag

FloatParameter.name: built_in_clutch_dt
FloatParameter.Comment: Internal Clutch Model Integration Step

IntParameter.name: experimental
IntParameter.Comment: enables experimental clutch cosimlation

IntParameter.name: built_in_engine_active
IntParameter.Comment: Internal Engine Activity Flag

IntParameter.name: built_in_gearbox_active
IntParameter.Comment: Internal Gearbox Activity Flag

IntParameter.name: update_ride_height_maps
IntParameter.Comment: Activation Flag For Ride Height Maps Update. Works only with DrivingMachine events

FloatParameter.name: v_init
FloatParameter.Comment: Initial velocity for automatic ride height maps computation (MaxPerformance and SpeedGen events) [m/s]

FloatParameter.name: v_end
FloatParameter.Comment: Velocity end condition for automatic ride height maps computation (MaxPerformance and SpeedGen events) [m/s]

FloatParameter.name: dt
FloatParameter.Comment: Integration step size for automatic ride height maps computation (MaxPerformance and SpeedGen events) [s]

FloatParameter.name: dtout
FloatParameter.Comment: Output step size for automatic ride height maps computation (MaxPerformance and SpeedGen events) [s]

FloatParameter.name: aero_drag_smoothing_time
FloatParameter.Comment: Smoothing time for Aerodynamics Drag Force (MaxPerformance and SpeedGen events) [s]

FloatParameter.name: aero_downforce_smoothing_time
FloatParameter.Comment: Smoothing time for Aerodynamics Down Forces (MaxPerformance and SpeedGen events) [s]

FloatParameter.name: aero_settling_time
FloatParameter.Comment: Settling Time for Aerodynamics Forces (MaxPerformance and SpeedGen events) [s]

IntParameter.name: experimental_mode
IntParameter.Comment: flag to enable new ride height maps description

FloatParameter.name: minimum_load_percentage
FloatParameter.Comment: % of axle load wrt static condition to be used as mimimum for rh independent variable

FloatParameter.name: maximum_load_percentage
FloatParameter.Comment: % of axle load wrt static condition to be used as maximum for rh independent variable

FloatParameter.name: loadcase_duration
FloatParameter.Comment: time required to increase axle load

FloatParameter.name: g
FloatParameter.Comment: Acceleration due to gravity

IntParameter.name: activity_flag
IntParameter.Comment: Circular Buffer Activity Flag

FloatParameter.name: dimension
FloatParameter.Comment: Max results dimension [seconds]

FloatParameter.name: statics_abort_time
FloatParameter.Comment: Abort simulation if static equilibrium is not achieved within this time

FloatParameter.name: statics_trans_speed_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: Static equilibrium is not achieved until the norm of the system translational speeds is below this value

FloatParameter.name: statics_trans_accel_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: Static equilibrium is not achieved until the norm of the system translational accelerations is below this value

FloatParameter.name: statics_angular_speed_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: Static equilibrium is not achieved until the norm of the system angular speeds is below this value

FloatParameter.name: statics_angular_accel_threshold
FloatParameter.Comment: Static equilibrium is not achieved until the norm of the system angular acceleration is below this value

IntParameter.name: statics_use_linear_damper
IntParameter.Comment: Linear dampers are used during statics when the parameter is set to 1

FloatParameter.name: statics_linear_damper_rate_front
FloatParameter.Comment: Front dampers damping rate used in statics

FloatParameter.name: statics_linear_damper_rate_rear
FloatParameter.Comment: Rear dampers damping rate used in statics

IntParameter.name: statics_use_linear_spring
IntParameter.Comment: Linear springs are used during statics when the parameter is set to 1

FloatParameter.name: statics_linear_spring_rate_front
FloatParameter.Comment: Front springs stiffness used in statics

FloatParameter.name: statics_linear_spring_rate_rear
FloatParameter.Comment: Rear springs stiffness used in statics

FloatParameter.name: statics_brake_damping
FloatParameter.Comment: auxiliary wheel damping used in statics

FloatParameter.name: statics_integration_time_step
FloatParameter.Comment: integration time step to be used during static/setup analysis (<=0 -> use dynamic event dt)

FloatParameter.name: rotational_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for chassis rotational stiffness lock PID

FloatParameter.name: rotational_kd
FloatParameter.Comment: Derivative Gain for chassis rotational stiffness lock PID

FloatParameter.name: rotational_ki
FloatParameter.Comment: Integral Gain for chassis rotational stiffness lock PID

FloatParameter.name: translational_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for chassis translational stiffness lock PID

FloatParameter.name: translational_kd
FloatParameter.Comment: Derivative Gain for chassis translational stiffness lock PID

FloatParameter.name: translational_ki
FloatParameter.Comment: Integral Gain for chassis translational stiffness lock PID

FloatParameter.name: mode
FloatParameter.Comment: Setup mode: 1-> standard (pushrod) 2-> preload

FloatParameter.name: tolerance
FloatParameter.Comment: Tolerance for setup targets; warning issued for target greater than tolerance [0.0 - 1.0]

IntParameter.name: statistics
IntParameter.Comment: activation flag for setup statistics

IntParameter.name: orientation_reference
IntParameter.Comment: Reference for suspension angles adjustments: 1-> sprung mass; 2-> ground

FloatParameter.name: ride_height_preload_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for Ride Height Adjustment (preload)

FloatParameter.name: ride_height_preload_kd

FloatParameter.Comment: Integral Gain for Ride Height Adjustment (preload)

FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for Ride Height Adjustment

FloatParameter.name: ride_height_standard_kd
FloatParameter.Comment: Derivative Gain for Ride Height Adjustment

FloatParameter.name: ride_height_standard_ki
FloatParameter.Comment: Integral Gain for Ride Height Adjustment

FloatParameter.name: pin_height_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for Pin Height

FloatParameter.name: pin_height_kd
FloatParameter.Comment: Derivative Gain for Pin Height

FloatParameter.name: pin_height_ki
FloatParameter.Comment: Integral Gain for Pin Height

FloatParameter.name: ratio_kp

FloatParameter.name: ratio_ki
FloatParameter.Comment: Ratio Method Integrative Gain

FloatParameter.name: force_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Force Method Proportioanl Gain

FloatParameter.name: force_ki
FloatParameter.Comment: Force Method Integrative Gain

FloatParameter.name: preload_RH_CW_gain
FloatParameter.Comment: Cross Weight overall Gain used when RH mode is set to 2 (preload)

IntParameter.name: setup_wheels_active
IntParameter.Comment: Activity flag for setup wheels

FloatParameter.name: setup_wheels_normal_stiffness
FloatParameter.Comment: Setup wheels normal stiffness

FloatParameter.name: front_right

FloatParameter.name: rear_left
FloatParameter.Comment: Rear left setup wheels radius

FloatParameter.name: rear_right
FloatParameter.Comment: Rear right setup wheels radius

FloatParameter.name: cross_weight_tolerance
FloatParameter.Comment: Tolerance for cross weight targets; warning issued for target greater than tolerance [0.0 - 1.0]

IntParameter.name: setup_on_flat_road
IntParameter.Comment: flag to use flat road during setup analysis

FloatParameter.name: locked_differential_kp
FloatParameter.Comment: Proportional Gain for locked differential controller

FloatParameter.name: locked_differential_kd
FloatParameter.Comment: Derivative Gain for locked differential controller

FloatParameter.name: locked_differential_ki
FloatParameter.Comment: Integral Gain for locked differential controller

FloatParameter.name: user_differential_lp_filter
FloatParameter.Comment: Activity flag for user differential low pass filter - cutoff freq 100Hz

FloatParameter.name: LSD_omega_threshold

FloatParameter.name: front_aux_roll_damping
FloatParameter.Comment: Front auxiliary roll force damping

FloatParameter.name: rear_aux_roll_damping
FloatParameter.Comment: Rear auxiliary roll force damping

IntParameter.name: setup_active

FloatParameter.name: std_tire_ref_X
FloatParameter.Comment: X Location for standard tire reference

FloatParameter.name: front_aux_vertical_damping

IntParameter.name: MATLAB
IntParameter.Comment: MATLAB output export activity flag

IntParameter.name: SPC
IntParameter.Comment: Seven Post Rig input export activity flag (Full Vehicle Dynamic Analyses Only)

IntParameter.name: AeroMode
IntParameter.Comment: Aerodynamic mode: 0->Data 1->Model

IntParameter.name: OperativeMode
IntParameter.Comment: Operative mode: 0->Hub Acceleration 1->Spring Length

IntParameter.name: VelocityProfileFromDRD
IntParameter.Comment: Velocity profile source for output vdf (SPG/MXP): 0->vdf 1->drd

IntParameter.name: Req

IntParameter.name: Nam_Overwrite
IntParameter.Comment: Overwrite Nam File if exists: 0->Only in Files Only Mode 1->Always

IntParameter.name: active_fx_body_driver_feedforward
IntParameter.Comment: drag force chassis oriented feedforward activity flag

IntParameter.Comment: drag force gyro oriented feedforward activity flag

IntParameter.name: powertrain_extra_input
IntParameter.Comment: additional powertrain input activity flag

IntParameter.name: wheel_orientation_extra_input
IntParameter.Comment: additional wheel orientation input activity flag

IntParameter.name: engine_bushing_extra_input
IntParameter.Comment: additional engine bushing forces/torque input activity flag

IntParameter.name: active
IntParameter.Comment: VI-DriveSim dynamic library activity flag

StringParameter.name: library
StringParameter.Comment: Dynamic link library name for VI-DriveSim

IntParameter.name: user_input_activity
IntParameter.Comment: activity flag for additional input port for front suspension kinematic and compliance

IntParameter.name: user_input_activity
